subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
lead_paragraph: With a victory in the eight-day Critérium Dauphiné, Chris Froome announced himself as a major threat in this year's Tour de France, which kicks off on July 4.
snippet: With a victory in the eight-day Critérium Dauphiné, Chris Froome announced himself as a major threat in this year's Tour de France, which kicks off on July 4.
